originalText.text: June Homes made moving to New York easy. The apartments are available in every area, so it was quick to find something that worked for me. It also helps that I don't have to find my own roommates, the whole process is faster. The apartment that I stayed in was nice, clean, and well furnished. It's in a good area with quick access to public transportation. June gives simple instructions for move in and move out, and the whole experience was easy to navigate.

originalText.text: I had a great time staying with June Homes in Washington, DC. They were super helpful in assisting me with a short-term lease for my internship, providing a range of choices including both furnished and unfurnished options. The house was perfectly equipped with everything I could possibly need, making my stay comfortable and convenient. The support team at June Homes was very responsive and effective in addressing any issues I faced during my stay. I really recommend June Homes for anyone requiring a place to stay.

originalText.text:
June homes is truly the best option if you're looking for short term rentals.  I work remote and this is a great option to explore different cities and choose where to spend more time.
I rented 3 different full apartments with June properties in an 8 months span and every single time it was great.
I had a rental in NYC and they offered the best short term rental options in NYC!

They keep their word on everything offer and their customer support is quick and effective.
Everything is done through the app and portal and it's super user friendly.

If I ever need another short term rental I will definitely do it with June Homes!

originalText.text: I Have been a June homes  for over a year and I can say my experience has been wonderful! I especially love their support system every time I have an issue related to apartment they were Al me to resolve it fairly quickly. I especially recommend them you are an international student like myself!

originalText.text: I stayed with June Homes for a couple of months in 2 units. Overall, the experience is nice. The apartments are decent, and my roommates are friendly. I would recommend this place and will consider living with June Homes again if I need to move to a location where June Homes are available. Perfect for someone who wants a flexible place to stay or wants to explore the city!
